不玩B站的Python程序员不是好程序员 // Python Programmers who don't play YouTube are not good programmers
不玩刷leetcode的Python程序员不是好程序员 // Python Programmers who don't play leetcode are not good programmers
那么 // that
这个包就是希望：让leetcode刷题可以变得方便&有趣&容易 // This package is the hope: make it easy for leetcode to brush & interesting & easy
希望：能收集&录制leetcode的视频讲解 // Hope: can collect & record the video explanation of leetcode
希望：使用者可以贡献自己的代码&b站讲解视频。 // Hope: users can contribute their own code & YouTube explanation video.
这个包：easyleetcode // This package: easyleetcode
是基于Python FastAPI后端、Vue.js前端编写 // It is based on Python fastapi as server、Vue.js as client
供Python程序员一键刷leetcode学习 // For Python programmers to learn from leetcode fast
你可以在线web运行和书写你的代码 // You can run and write your code online on the web
支持Markdown笔记//Support markdown notes
Python代码位于：easyleetcode/leetcodes // Python Code location: easyleetcode / leetcodes
Markdown笔记位于：easyleetcode/leetcodes_md // Markdown Notes location: easyleetcode / leetcodes_ m
